movies.title: Little Miss Sunshine
movies.description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
movies.actors: Abigail Breslin, Greg Kinnear, Paul Dano, Alan Arkin

movies.title: Scent of a Woman
movies.description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy

movies.title: Batman
movies.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
movies.actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow

movies.title: Thank You for Smoking
movies.description: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.
movies.actors: Joan Lunden, Eric Haberman, Aaron Eckhart, Mary Jo Smith
